text: Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo ( ; born William Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo; 29 March 1944) is a Ghanaian politician. He was the President of Ghana from 2017 to 2025. He served as Attorney General from 2001 to 2003 and as Minister for Foreign Affairs from 2003 to 2007. In 2020, Akufo-Addo was re-elected beating former President John Mahama. ==References== ==Other websites== * GhanaWeb: Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo biography. * EIN News: Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo * Ghpage: Nana Addo Dankwa Akuffo Addo family and biography Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:African lawyers Category:Presidents of Ghana Nana Nana
title: Nana Akufo-Addo
